statements: UPDATE team_project SET project_name = 'New Project Name', project_description = 'Updated description' WHERE project_id = 1;

UPDATE team_project SET project_name='New Project 1', project_description='Description of Project 1', manager_id=100, start_date='2022-01-01', end_date='2022-12-31' WHERE project_id=1;

UPDATE team_project SET start_date='2022-02-15', end_date='2023-01-15', project_name='Updated Project 2', manager_id=105, project_description='New description for Project 2' WHERE manager_id=105 AND project_id=2;
UPDATE project_progress SET progress_percentage = 75 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE team_tasks SET assigned_to = 'John Doe', due_date = '2023-10-31' WHERE task_id = 5;

UPDATE team_tasks SET due_date = '2022-10-20', assigned_to = 'Alice' WHERE task_id = 5;
